oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Learning distinguishable linear grammars from positive data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LAXMINARAYANA, JA
SEMPERE, JM
NAGARAJA, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce a new algorithm to infer Terminal Distinguishable Linear Grammars from positive data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: GRAMMATICAL INFERENCE: ALGORITHMS AND APPLICATIONS, PROCEEDINGS,3264,279-280
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 7th International Colloquium on Grammatical Inference,Athens, GREECE,OCT 11-NOV 01, 2004
